name: Flexible Ping Pong
description:
YOU CAN ONLY PLAY THIS GAME WITH AN CONTROLLER.

Before you read the explanations for the game stop and download the game.

This Game was made within 60 hours for the Games Factory 8 Jam. My Game is only made for the Tertary Theme  Pong and the Constraint Max two buttons control.

But now to the Game:

The goal is to get the black ball to the green circle. You can achieve that by moving the black board.  You move it with the left joystick. With ,,a" you can change the angle of the board. So if you have been moving vertically, you move then horizontally. 

With ,,y" you can restart an level

If you get the black ball to the green circle you´re moving to the next level.

IMPORTANT:

THE FIRST ,,LEVEL" DOESNT HAVE ANY OBJECTIVE. It´s only for figuring out the controlls of the black board. If you´re confident with them, YOU CAN START THE REAL LEVELS WITH PRESSING ,,START" ON THE CONTROLLER. YOU FINISHED EVERY LEVEL IF YOU RECEIVE JUST AN BLACK SCREEN.

The challenges are getting harder with obstacles in the level. The Levels are designed that you normally should figure out on your own what every obstacle does.

But if not here is every obstacle listed, if you don´t understand one.

Level 1: Blue Blocks: Wand

Level 2: Red Blocks: Level will restart if the black ball or the black board will hit these blocks

Level 4: Orange Circle: Will turn into the normal green one after an time

Level 5: Purple Ball(s): Level will restart if the black ball will hit the ball. The purple ball will be destroyed if it will touch the red Blocks

Level 8: Purple ,,thing" (Don´t actually know how to describe this one): Shot´s purple balls.
